channel.title: Physician's conversion changes
channel.description:
**Physician**- No changes ___________________________________________________________________________________ **Herbalist-** Renamed to "Quack"
Passive: Heal: One use: If a member of the Unseen is attacked at night, and would have died, they do not die
Passive: Remedy Studies: Immune to Poison
Night Ability 1: Unearth •The player can now select a dead player at night to create a false report for. •The player chooses who they want to appear as the dead player's killer. •The dead player's fake killer is revealed the following morning. **The Unseen will know that it is faked and who the fake killer is** •The dead player's real killer will be revealed to the **Unseen**
Night Ability 2: Stitch: Infinite uses: Visit a player. That player will believe they were attacked and healed.
